metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10130 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The http_connect function in transports/http.c in libgit2 before 0.24.6 and 0.25.x before 0.25.1 might allow man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers by leveraging clobbering of the error variable.

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.26.0+dfsg.1-1.1build1').
